1.0.name: wordpress/flickr-photostream-widget
1.0.description: Rather than linking to the authors profile, this widget modifies the link to connect to the authors flickr photostream. This was designed for photoblogs that have multiple authors/photographers. If the shadowbox JS plugin is install the Flickr Photostream is rendered in a Lightbox, otherwise it will goto the flickr website. Uses the Yahoo IM account if in user profile, otherwise uses nickname. By Greg Royal/Bluecowhosting. Extends the Authors plugin from Gavriel Fleischer. Requires PHP 5.
